description: go: rely on exit code to tell if test passed

messages.text:
Hello adg (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

*** Submitted as 4c05941b1824 ***

go: rely on exit code to tell if test passed

R=adg, dsymonds
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5532066
LGTM, I guess, but I think it's reasonable to check for the presence of \nPASS\n in the output. It might catch something bad once in a blue moon.

On Tue, Jan 10, 2012 at 20:13,  <adg@golang.org> wrote:
> LGTM, I guess, but I think it's reasonable to check for the presence of
> \nPASS\n in the output. It might catch something bad once in a blue
> moon.

i thought so too; didn't work out.

subject: code review 5532066: go: rely on exit code to tell if test passed
